web_snippets: Gil Hoffman (Hebrew: גיל הופמן) is an Israeli-American journalist and political correspondent who serves as executive director of Honest Reporting.
Gil Hoffman is the executive director of HonestReporting, which fights for Israel in the international mainstream and social media.
